name: Snake Loops
description:
Your home is uninhabitable. You are drifting in space, searching.
Then - a call. Space Carrier 9X has found the perfect planet to make your home!

The problem?
The place is infested with Snake Loops!

You, a brave hunter, must portal to the planet and clear them away before you can begin settling. But make sure you get back before your portal closes, or you'll be stuck with the creatures forever!

Snake Loops is a simple game about jumping through loops. Snake Loops, to be precise. Don't get stuck!

Controls:

Hop: WASD or Arrow Keys

Hop Faster: Hold Shift

Jump: Space

Toggle Fullscreen: Ctrl + F

Collect berries to change your colour!
